attributes.action: Freeze mortgage/rent for at least 2 months&close businesses for 14 days COVID19
attributes.additional_details: In order to help prevent the spread of the coronavirus and in turn, thousands of people from becoming ill and potentially dying.
attributes.background: Government to freeze all mortgage and rent payments for at least 2 months. All UK businesses other than necessary to close for at least 14 days in order to help prevent spread of coronavirus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
